code:
def solve():
    t = int(input())
    for _ in range(t):
        n, m = map(int, input().split())
        a = list(map(int, input().split()))
        b = list(map(int, input().split()))

        def process(a, b):
            a_set = set(a)
            b_set = set(b)
            res = 0
            a_set = set(a)
            b_set = set(b)
            prefix = [0] * (len(b) + 1)
            for i in range(len(b)):
                prefix[i + 1] = prefix[i] + (b[i] in a_set)
            j = 0
            for i in range(len(b)):
                while j < len(a) and a[j] <= b[i]:
                    j += 1
                res = max(res, prefix[i + 1] - prefix[i])
            return res

        a_pos = [x for x in a if x > 0]
        b_pos = [x for x in b if x > 0]
        a_neg = [-x for x in reversed(a) if x < 0]
        b_neg = [-x for x in reversed(b) if x < 0]

        ans = process(a_pos, b_pos) + process(a_neg, b_neg)
        print(ans)

solve()
